Our Rooms


BURGUNDY ROOM

See The Details Book Now Virtual Tour

This ground floor One-bedroom Suite is a spacious bedroom with Four-poster King Bed. The bedside fireplace sets the perfect mood for luxury and comfort. Retreat to your private bay-window seat. A separate living room is equipped with a Queen pull-out sofa bed, writing desk and antique armoire. Beautiful Gilded Aged décor bathroom with Jacuzzi tub/shower. Signature Bath Amenities, Iron / Ironing Board, and Daily Maid Service are also included.

  • 1 King Bed
  • AC
  • Breakfast Included
  • In Room Coffee Maker
  • 1 Pull Out Queen Bed
  • Flat Screen TV with Cable
  • Comfortable Bathrobes
  • Jacuzzi - Shower
  • Sitting Parlor
  • Wi-fi
  • Parking Available
  • Fireplace

THE LANAI SUITE

See The Details Book Now Virtual Tour

Luxury Suite featuring a small private 2nd floor balcony with views of Narragansett Bay. King bed, and a separate lounging room with comfortable queen sized pull out sofa. En-suite bathroom with Gilded Age décor featuring a Jacuzzi tub/shower. Signature Bath Amenities, Iron / Ironing Board, and Daily Maid Service are also included.

  • 1 King Bed
  • AC
  • Breakfast Included
  • In Room Coffee Maker
  • 1 Pull Out Queen Bed
  • Flat Screen TV with Cable
  • Comfortable Bathrobes
  • Sitting Parlor
  • Balcony
  • Wi-fi
  • Parking Available
  • Jacuzzi - Shower

BLUE BAY ROOM

See The Details Book Now Virtual Tour

A romantic hide-away in itself. A Four-poster Queen bed and bedside fireplace create the right atmosphere for a romantic Newport getaway. Compass Rose Décor bathroom features Jacuzzi tub/shower that assures your always pointed in the right direction. This spacious room with bay windows and seating area offers views of the Bay and Newport Bridge. Signature Bath Amenities, Iron / Ironing Board, and Daily Maid Service are also included.

  • 1 Queen Bed
  • AC
  • Breakfast Included
  • In Room Coffee Maker
  • Flat Screen TV with Cable
  • Comfortable Bathrobes
  • Jacuzzi - Shower
  • Wi-fi
  • Parking Available
  • Fireplace

SUNSET ROOM

See The Details Book Now Virtual Tour

Great views of Narragansett Bay and daily sunsets. Featuring a Queen Four-poster bed. En-suite bathroom with a Greek Décor shower accent this cozy and intimate room that will ensure the perfect B&B experience. Signature Bath Amenities, Iron / Ironing Board, and Daily Maid Service are also included.

  • 1 Queen Bed
  • AC
  • Breakfast Included
  • In Room Coffee Maker
  • Flat Screen TV with Cable
  • Comfortable Bathrobes
  • Wi-fi
  • Parking Available
  • Fireplace

PLANTATION ROOM

See The Details Book Now Virtual Tour

Oversized windows with views on Narragansett Bay dominate this room with King Bed in a tropical décor, creating a true island atmosphere. En-Suite bathroom in romantic Heron inspired décor with Jacuzzi tub/shower. Signature Bath Amenities, Iron / Ironing Board, and Daily Maid Service are also included.

  • 1 King Bed
  • AC
  • Breakfast Included
  • In Room Coffee Maker
  • Flat Screen TV with Cable
  • Comfortable Bathrobes
  • Wi-fi
  • Parking Available
  • Jacuzzi - Shower
